languages.text: {n}Один за другим еретики сдают оружие, словно паства, подносящая дары грозному богу, что может стереть их в порошок одним взглядом. Пожалуй, для них, узревших ваш тактический гений и неуемную мощь, данный образ не так далек от правды.{/n}

{n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Один за другим еретики сдают оружие, словно паства, подносящая дары грозному богу, что может стереть их в порошок одним взглядом. Пожалуй, для них, узревших ваш тактический гений и неуемную мощь, данный образ не так далек от правды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One after another, the heretics hand in their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they've witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image isn't far from the truth.{/n}

{n}One after another, the heretics hand in their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they've witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image isn't far from the truth.{/n}

{n}One after another, the heretics hand in their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they've witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image isn't far from the truth.{/n}

{n}One after another, the heretics hand in their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they've witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image isn't far from the truth.{/n}

{n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}

{n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}异端分子一个接一个交出了武器，仿佛一群信徒对恐怖的神明献上祭品一般，就仿佛神明仅仅看他们一眼，就可以将他们碾为齑粉一样。或许对他们来说，你在他们眼中的形象与这样的神明也差不了多少，毕竟他们已经亲眼目睹了你精妙的战术与无羁的力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异端分子一个接一个交出了武器，仿佛一群信徒对恐怖的神明献上祭品一般，就仿佛神明仅仅看他们一眼，就可以将他们碾为齑粉一样。或许对他们来说，你在他们眼中的形象与这样的神明也差不了多少，毕竟他们已经亲眼目睹了你精妙的战术与无羁的力量。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einer nach dem anderen geben die Ketzer ihre Waffen ab, wie eine Glaubensgemeinschaft, die einem furchterregenden Gott Opfer darbringt, dessen bloßer Blick sie pulverisieren könnte. Nachdem sie nun deine taktische Genialität und deine ungezügelte Macht erlebt haben, ist dieses Bild für sie vielleicht gar nicht so weit von der Wahrheit entfernt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer nach dem anderen geben die Ketzer ihre Waffen ab, wie eine Glaubensgemeinschaft, die einem furchterregenden Gott Opfer darbringt, dessen bloßer Blick sie pulverisieren könnte. Nachdem sie nun deine taktische Genialität und deine ungezügelte Macht erlebt haben, ist dieses Bild für sie vielleicht gar nicht so weit von der Wahrheit entfernt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uno tras otro los herejes entregan sus armas, como una congregación que presentara ofrendas a una deidad terrorífica capaz de pulverizarlos con una sola mirada. Tal vez para ellos, ahora que han presenciado tu genio táctico y tu poder desatado, esa imagen no diste mucho de la verdad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno tras otro los herejes entregan sus armas, como una congregación que presentara ofrendas a una deidad terrorífica capaz de pulverizarlos con una sola mirada. Tal vez para ellos, ahora que han presenciado tu genio táctico y tu poder desatado, esa imagen no diste mucho de la verdad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'un après l'autre, les hérétiques déposent les armes, tels les membres d'une congrégation qui apporteraient des offrandes à un dieu terrifiant dont le seul regard suffirait à les pulvériser. Pour eux, qui ont été témoins de votre génie tactique et de votre puissance débridée, cette image n'est peut-être pas si loin de la vérité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un après l'autre, les hérétiques déposent les armes, tels les membres d'une congrégation qui apporteraient des offrandes à un dieu terrifiant dont le seul regard suffirait à les pulvériser. Pour eux, qui ont été témoins de votre génie tactique et de votre puissance débridée, cette image n'est peut-être pas si loin de la vérité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あたかも信徒たちが、視線だけで自分たちを粉々にできるような恐ろしい神に進物を捧げるように、異端者たちは次々と武器を差し出した。おそらく彼らにとっては、あなたの天才的な戦術と何物にも抑えられない力を目の当たりにした今、そのイメージはそう的外れなものではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One after another, the heretics hand over their weapons, like a congregation bringing gifts to a terrifying god whose stare alone could pulverise them. Perhaps for them, now that they have witnessed your tactical genius and unbridled might, that image is not far from the truth.{/n}
